name: Turbo Mind Warp
description: Turbo Mind Warp is a hybrid bred by MTG Seeds, who crossed parent strains Turbo Diesel and Mendo Mind Warp. As buds bloom, the leaves take on a deep reddish hue and some phenotypes will express colorful pink-purple pistils. Its plants are highly resistant to mold, and Turbo Mind Warpâ€™s high calyx-to-leaf ratio make trimming a breeze.
